attributes.action: To have the right to register a vote of no confidence on all electoral votes
attributes.background: I believe that to show a true democracy, one must be able to vote no confidence in any party, given the current state of British politics at the moment and politicians constant disregard for the will of the people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by registering a vote of no confidence on all electoral votes, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we're not sure if you want to include a "none of the above" option on ballot papers, or want the right to register no confidence in some other way.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. Or you might like to sign one of these petitions, if it calls for something you's like to happen.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/264036

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/261334

You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.
